word_mean: 面，表面：物体的外面部分或外表面，用于包括正式解剖学命名法的各种名称，见facies项下

sentence.Network_en: Rumours of financial scandals have come bubbling back to the surface.
sentence.Network_cn: 有关财务丑闻的谣言接连不断地冒出来。

sentence.Network_en: Somewhere deep beneath the surface lay a caring character.
sentence.Network_cn: 在内心深处的某个角落里埋藏着一颗爱心。

sentence.Network_en: As the egg whites cook, they coagulate and rise to the surface.
sentence.Network_cn: 蛋白一煮就会凝结，并且浮起来。

jx.jx_en_mean: To all intents and purposes; to all outward appearances
jx.jx_cn_mean: 为所有意图和目的；在外表上

lj.lj_ly: a soldier who, on the surface, appeared brave and patriotic.
lj.lj_ls: 表面上很勇敢和爱国的一个士兵

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from French (see sur-, face), suggested by Latin superficies

encyclopedia.content: Surface最开始是微软公司推出的一款全新的触摸式电脑，另外，微软公司于北京时间2012年6月19日，美国当地时间6月18日6点半在加州好莱坞Milk Studio召开新闻发布会，发布了Surface系列平板电脑。这款平板电脑采用镁合金机身，10.6英寸显示屏，配备USB 2.0或3.0接口，使用Windows 8操作系统。微软官网将其称为“全高清显示屏”，屏幕比例为16:9。这款产品分为两个版本：一个使用Nvidia代工的ARM处理器，以及Windows 8专为ARM设计的版本Windows RT；另一个使用英特尔Core i5 Ivy Bridge处理器，使用Windows 8专业版。

entry.def: The surface of something is the flat top part of it or the outside of it.

example.ex: Ozone forms a protective layer between 12 and 30 miles above the Earth's surface.
example.tran: 臭氧在地球表面上方 12 到 30 英里处形成一个保护层。

example.ex: ...tiny little waves on the surface of the water...

entry.def: A work surface is a flat area, for example the top of a table, desk, or kitchen cupboard, on which you can work.

example.ex: It can simply be left on the work surface...
example.tran: 把它放在操作台上就行了。

example.ex: Place the fish on a flat surface and sprinkle the flesh with lemon juice and pepper.
example.tran: 将鱼放在案面上并在鱼肉上撒柠檬汁和胡椒粉。

entry.def: When you refer to the surface of a situation, you are talking about what can be seen easily rather than what is hidden or not immediately obvious.

example.ex: Back in Britain, things appear, on the surface, simpler...
example.tran: 而在英国国内，事情表面上看来要简单一些。

example.ex: Social unrest, never far below the surface in Brazil, has erupted over the last few days...
example.tran: 巴西一直以来一触即发的社会不安定因素在过去的几天里爆发了。

entry.def: Surface is used to describe the parts of the armed forces which travel by ship or by land rather than underwater or in the air.

example.ex: In contrast with its surface fleet, Britain's submarine force was relatively small.
example.tran: 同其水面舰队相比，英国的潜艇部队规模相对较小。

entry.def: If someone or something under water surfaces, they come up to the surface of the water.
When something such as a piece of news, a feeling, or a problem surfaces, it becomes known or becomes obvious.

example.ex: The paper says the evidence, when it surfaces, is certain to cause uproar...
example.tran: 该报称该证据一经披露，一定会引起骚动。

example.ex: The emotions will surface at some point in life...
example.tran: 各种情绪都会在生活中的某个时刻流露出来。

entry.tran: (一段时间未见后)现身，露面;醒来
entry.def: When someone surfaces, they appear after not being seen for some time, for example because they have been asleep.

example.ex: There's no chance that he'll surface because he's bound to have heard by now...
example.tran: 他不会再出现了，因为他现在肯定听说了。

means.word_mean: 1. the outer boundary of an artifact or a material layer constituting or resembling such a boundary;

sentences.sentence: "there is a special cleaner for these surfaces"
"the cloth had a pattern of red dots on a white surface"

means.word_mean: 2. the extended two-dimensional outer boundary of a three-dimensional object;

sentences.sentence: "they skimmed over the surface of the water"
"a brush small enough to clean every dental surface"

means.word_mean: 3. the outermost level of the land or sea;

sentences.sentence: "three quarters of the Earth's surface is covered by water"

means.word_mean: 4. a superficial aspect as opposed to the real nature of something;

sentences.sentence: "it was not what it appeared to be on the surface"
"all the reports were out in the open"
"the facts had been brought to the surface"

means.word_mean: 6. a device that provides reactive force when in motion relative to the surrounding air; can lift or control a plane in flight
2. put a coat on; cover the surface of; furnish with a surface;
3. appear or become visible; make a showing;

sentences.sentence: "I hope the list key is going to surface again"

auth_sentence.content: Lay the pasta sheets onto a clean work surface.
auth_sentence.res_content: Lay the pasta sheets onto a clean work surface.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Lay the pasta sheets onto a clean work surface.

auth_sentence.content: Tip the pastry out onto a floured work surface.
auth_sentence.res_content: Tip the pastry out onto a floured work surface.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Tip the pastry out onto a floured work surface.

auth_sentence.content: But the real treats are deeper below the surface.
auth_sentence.res_content: But the real treats are deeper below the surface.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But the real treats are deeper below the surface.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 等在同辅音词根前表示"在下面;随后"; 2. 表示"超过,在……上面"

stems_affixes.word_buile: sur在下面;随后+rept爬+itious……的→在下面爬→鬼鬼崇崇的
sur超过,在……上面+plus多余;加→多出很多
sur在下面;随后+render给予→把[枪]放下去→投降
surround[v.包围]+ing表名词→被围起来的状态→环境
sur超过,在……上面+charge费用→额外的收费→附加费
sur超过,在……上面+realism现实主义→n.超现实主义
sur超过,在……上面+veil面纱+lance→在面纱上看[隔了一层纱]看→临视
sur超过,在……上面+viv生命+al表名词→经过事故活着→幸存
sur在下面;随后+render给予→把[枪]放下去→投降
sur在下面;随后+round圆圈→在下面围一圈
sur超过,在……上面+mount山→在山上→登上
sur超过,在……上面+pass通过→在上面通过→超越

Sentence.sentence: They say that they are drawn to the prospect of learning applications outside the classroom, though such lesson plans have yet to surface.
Unlike floating ice shelves which have little impact on sea level when they break up, the ice sheet is anchored to bedrock will blow the sea surface.

sentences.en: The wooden surface had a beautiful shine.
sentences.cn: 这木头表面发出美丽的光亮。

sentences.en: The boy disturbed the tranquil surface of the pond with a stick.
sentences.cn: 那男孩用棍子打破了平静的池面。

sentences.en: You must not look only at the surface of things.
sentences.cn: 看事物不能只看表面现象。

sentences.en: This essay is so short that it can only scratch the surface of the topic.
sentences.cn: 这篇文章很短, 只能对这一问题作肤浅的探讨。

jushi.english: He struggled to the surface as the water dragged him down.
jushi.chinese: 水流使他下沉,可他挣扎着浮出水面。

jushi.english: The sea covers almost three-fourths of the earth's surface.
jushi.chinese: 海洋几乎占地球表面的四分之三。

jushi.english: He did not merely see the surface but penetrated beneath.
jushi.chinese: 他不仅看到事物的表面,而且透过它看到本质。
